title: On the Town: Signature Chefs Auction
text: On the Town: Signature Chefs Auction Buy Photo People line up to sample the many different foods available at the annual Signature Chefs Auction to benefit the March of Dimes on Oct. 6 at the Hilton Melbourne Rialto. Brian Curl/For FLORIDA TODAY Fullscreen Buy Photo There were plenty of silent auction items to bid on during the annual Signature Chefs Auction to benefit the March of Dimes on Oct. 6 at the Hilton Melbourne Rialto Place.
